text:
Koito, your stage performance earlier was great!
You handled the talk part well.

You were weaving various stories about this town,
so the audience seemed really pleased.

You knew a lot about how this town used to be an
inn town, right? Were you originally familiar with it?

B-Before the stage, I did some research...
on the history and the famous places.

I thought it would be better to hav
 lots of things to talk about.

Is that so...!
You did a great job.

N-No!
I-It's just natural to do something like this...!

Haha, I see.
You're reliable, Koito.
